channel.title: Admin item help
channel.description:
is there a way of doing this
Say im wearing a p ring I try to wear p Knecklace then it say "sorry u cant have both on at the same time" and then it unequipps knecklace

item.title: Admin item help
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

How is your topic name related to your post in anyway?

And yes but with all items or with certain items?

if with all items go to case 41 (i think) and make it check all the wearslot’s and if the item’s wearslot is the same make a sendmsg saying whatever then unequip that slot. it’s easier than it sounds but im not going to spoon feed you.

Read full topic
